abstract: The agreement to allow bidding on oil leases with the United States comes four years after a rig explosion and devastating oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
snippet: The agreement to allow bidding on oil leases with the United States comes four years after a rig explosion and devastating oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The agreement to allow BP to bid on new oil leases in the Gulf of Mexico and elsewhere in the United States is an important milestone in the company’s efforts to return to normal after the Deepwater Horizon rig explosion nearly four years ago, analysts said Friday.

headline.main: Lifting of Ban Should Return BP to Competition, Analysts Say
